newsitem.title: USA: Stage Stores proceeds with IPO, sees better market.
newsitem.headline: Stage Stores proceeds with IPO, sees better market.

text.p: Stage Stores Inc, the parent company of Specialty Retailers Inc, said on Tuesday that it will proceed with its initial public offering, citing improved conditions in the IPO market.
Lead underwriter CS First Boston said the offering of 10 million shares is expected to price between $14 and $16 a share.
The company has applied to trade on the Nasdaq National Market under the symbol "STGE" and the offering is expected to go public the week of October 21, the underwriter said.
